feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250118-a9fa743
entry.content:
• a9fa743 Merge pull request #576 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • dd195b4 Implement --dry-run for SyncCommand by ArabCoders
  • bcc3c4f Attempt at auto release by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Updated servers.yaml to have both import/export enabled by default by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/1
  • Fixed typos by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/2
  • Added Warning for alpha version. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/3
  • Fixing some bugs in Emby Server and general code improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/4
  • Added Task Scheduler. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/5
  • Updated docker setup in preparation for pushing images. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/6
  • Updated version. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/7
  • Replace guzzlephp with Symfony/http-client to support http2. Closes #1 by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/9
  • Updated version. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/10
  • Updated README.md and added new options by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/12
  • test building containers by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/14
  • Updated GitHub build workflow. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/15
  • Updated Container build, and made more options avaliable via ENV. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/16
  • Changed servers import responsibility to only produce valid item, and delegate the checks to mapper. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/17
  • Fixed bug in ignoring unwatched implementation. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/18
  • Switched to Using json streams by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/20
  • Started writing tests for essential code. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/21
  • ignore v0* tags builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/22
  • Improved sqlite PRGMA choices as such, expect faster db operations. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/23
  • Fixed regression in parsing Plex webhook event. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/24
  • Fixed export not working correctly when --mapper-preload is not set. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/27
  • Added support for more webhook events. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/28
  • Initial Quick push implelemnation. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/30
  • Added Servers ViewCommand, and updated EditCommand flags to better reflect 1to1 relation to servers.yaml config keys. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/31
  • Add new commands by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/33
  • Merge add/edit command into servers:manage by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/34
  • Improvements to Manage command, better error handling and disabled command on non-tty mode. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/35
  • Added arm64 build support. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/36
  • First beta release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/37
  • New config key to separate config and DB dirs from temp dirs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/38
  • Enabled support pgsql and mysql as PDO backends. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/39
  • Removed some configurability in favor of streamlined options. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/40
  • Updated Plex UserId to support both int|string by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/42
  • Removed no longer unused files, added WS_TZ for timezone by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/43
  • Fixed passing server options to backend controller. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/44
  • Improved logging messages and enabled file log by default by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/45
  • Added support for plex old legacy agents, added sanity check for empty sections by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/47
  • Fixed incorrect user matching when enforcing user ids. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/50
  • Added clearer log messages for webhook related messages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/52
  • Updated jellyfin/emby allowed webhook events. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/53
  • Updated README.md and added FAQ.md by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/54
  • typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/55
  • Updated the user permissions for nginx inside the container. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/57
  • Added database browser command. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/58
  • Simplified Cron Runner & Optimized composer install by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/59
  • Tie webhook and request debug logs to a request_id for better tracking. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/60
  • Simplified Task moved logic out of shell scripting by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/61
  • Added new command and task to prune older logs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/62
  • Fixed matching old plex legacy agents. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/63
  • Updated some commands to expand their usage. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/64
  • Increase the verbosity of no valid GUIDs from DEBUG to NOTICE. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/65
  • Moved --regenerate-api-key to servers:edit command and updated README.md by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/66
  • Added WS_DEBUG_IMPORT to save invalid GUIDs responses from server. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/67
  • Added support for xbmc nfo agents for plex by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/70
  • Sandbox external json streaming library to prevent complete operation failure by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/71
  • Disabled agents.xbmcnfotv parsing is it not really giving the unique episode id. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/73
  • Use correct Wrapper for streaming json decoder. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/74
  • Added new servers:remote flag --search to lookup items in the remote â€¦ by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/75
  • Cast ignore list to string regardless of value. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/77
  • Allow the importing of unwatched items via Scheduled tasks. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/79
  • Updated FAQ.md by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/80
  • Made No Valid GUIDs error level controllable by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/81
  • Removed --import-unwatched flag for import. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/82
  • Dropped support for alternative database engines. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/84
  • Fixed missing ignore list casting in different conditions. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/85
  • Removed all legacy plex agents for tv shows by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/86
  • Force Plex backend to set user to 1 if server reports 1 admin account. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/88
  • Parse TV Show GUIDs by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/89
  • Added more db:list search options using GUIDs. for both parent and item. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/90
  • Added output option for db:list by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/91
  • Added the ability to generate Relative GUIDs on demand. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/92
  • Preparing export/import to support relative GUIDs in the future. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/93
  • Preparing parse Webhook to support relative GUIDs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/94
  • Preparing state:cache to support relative GUIDs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/95
  • Implemented support for Relative GUIDs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/96
  • Added sort option for db:list by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/97
  • Fixed incorrect cache path. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/100
  • New database design. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/98
  • New Database design. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/102
  • Added media backend side ids directly into the main table. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/103
  • Fixed Jellyfin Item id in webhook parsing. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/104
  • Added suids field to the list of always change if differ list. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/105
  • Fixed incorrect External id matching in tests. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/106
  • Added missing server name in state:export log. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/107
  • Next master build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/108
  • Updated state:push command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/110
  • Webhook: Race condition in plex multi server handling. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/111
  • added missing time for nginx log messages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/112
  • New metdata db by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/113
  • New metadata oriented table design by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/114
  • Added servers:remote --search-id option to get metadata from backend. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/115
  • Fixed bug in plex webhook push sync. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/116
  • Added db:queue command. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/117
  • Transform backend search results by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/118
  • Support marking items as unplayed via state:import by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/119
  • FAQ.md remove outdated info about importing unplayed items. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/120
  • Added autocomplete for common option and argument values. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/121
  • Performance imporvement by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/122
  • Performance improvement for state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/123
  • Code Cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/124
  • Added Alternative mapper for memory constrained systems. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/125
  • Massively increased Direct Mapper performance during import operation. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/126
  • Combined relative and external id lookup to reduce storage lookups by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/127
  • Added new option for servers:remote to look for mismatched items. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/128
  • Use parallel requests for --search-mismatch lookups. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/129
  • Simplified mismatch, and started moving backends actions into separate commands. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/131
  • Added backend:library:unmatched command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/132
  • Updated FAQ.md by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/133
  • Cleaned up and separated servers:remote subcommands by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/134
  • Fixed overriding updated column in webhook context. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/135
  • Fixed bug in selecting user via servers:manage by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/138
  • Allow cache disabling & tweaked container config. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/139
  • Temp fix for jellyfin reporting incorrect imdb external ids. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/142
  • Made it possible to import metadata without effecting play state. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/143
  • Converted Guid fetal exceptions into errors by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/144
  • Fixed bug in getting item id in Emby webhook handling by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/145
  • Updated logs file naming to allow for easier pruning. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/146
  • Added simple log viewer. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/147
  • Added the ability to add/remove item from push queue. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/148
  • Updating log messages to be more meaningful by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/149
  • Temporarily disabled push mode in export context. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/151
  • Support Dual mode in state:export & Update the extra column in webhook context. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/152
  • Performance improvements for jellyfin/emby mismatch/unmatched & Update the extra field on import via webhook or task by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/153
  • Made it possible to sort on multiple columns in db:list. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/154
  • Updated state:push log messages by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/155
  • Refactored InspectRequest, GetMetaData and getIdentifier out of clients main files. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/156
  • Updated README.md & FAQ.md by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/157
  • Added log message about plex reporting multiple external ids for same data source by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/158
  • Added retry logic to handle locked database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/159
  • Moved Backends support methods to a trait to ease code migration. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/161
  • Refactored webhook handling. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/162
  • Fixed Plex media production year parsing. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/163
  • using LIKE for metadata/extra search in db:list by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/164
  • Migrated backends user list to separate action. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/165
  • Migrated backends search methods into separate actions. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/166
  • Migrating backends methods into separate actions. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/167
  • Fully migrated all backends action into separate action classes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/168
  • Cleaned up shared import/export code. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/169
  • Updated system:logs to better reflect the changes to our logging system. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/170
  • Changed how we report main data to webhooks handler. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/171
  • Prioritize relative ids for episodes and implements ignore list by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/172
  • Added an option to disable external id parsing for episodes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/174
  • Fixed missing pointer in specific case leading to duplicate episodes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/175
  • Adding debug trace to all exception catchers. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/176
  • MemoryMapper: report changed data more accurately. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/177
  • Fixed updating last import date for backends. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/178
  • Code cleanup. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/179
  • Made export smarter by marking items not found by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/180
  • Support adding scope to ignore guid rule. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/181
  • Improved the display of ignore list by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/182
  • Attribute based router by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/183
  • Create better indexes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/184
  • Backup backends play state. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/185
  • Added backend:restore command. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/186
  • New task runner by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/187
  • Code maintenance by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/188
  • Code maintenance by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/190
  • Added multi filter for config:view by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/191
  • turn on disable external id parsing for episodes by default. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/192
  • Added backend:library:ignore command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/193
  • help doc update by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/194
  • Fixed bug in backends base path by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/196
  • Disable arm64 builds for non default branch commits. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/197
  • Rebased the container image on our base php image by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/198
  • Fixed bug in parsing plex library id when running manual import. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/199
  • Fixed bug in state:backup dry run mode. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/200
  • Remove old Server classes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/201
  • Fixed bug in emby parse webhook metadata. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/202
  • Added X-Plex-Container-Size for plex backend. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/203
  • Removed Backend virtual guid. No longer needed or used. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/204
  • Change default run group to users, and create config structure before starting services. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/207
  • Potential fix some replaced items marking items as unplayed. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/208
  • Added notice about jellyfin/emby Use Date scanned into library. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/209
  • Implemented support for marking items as played/unplayed. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/211
  • Support loading container env vars via .env file by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/212
  • Fixed bug preventing state:backup from working if no filter was used. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/215
  • Steps to switch to rootless container by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/216
  • Rootless container by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/217
  • added health check endpoint. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/218
  • Adding missing health check for Dockerfile by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/219
  • redirect tasks output. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/220
  • Update default http server by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/221
  • Update FAQ.md by @simssj in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/222
  • more fixes for running rootless. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/223
  • More updates to account for rootless changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/224
  • Minor performance enhancement for guid parsing. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/225
  • look for more ways to detect if running inside a container. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/226
  • Implement pagination for backends library request. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/228
  • cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/229
  • README/faq text updates. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/230
  • Do not trigger build if commits only contains non code changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/231
  • Improved webhook error handing. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/232
  • Change how we process webhook http requests. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/233
  • Miscellaneous changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/234
  • Added queuePush logic in state:requests by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/235
  • Plex started to throw warning on requests with count higher than 1000 by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/237
  • Allow using external Redis server instead of included server. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/238
  • Improved logging when encountering unexpected content type. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/241
  • Updated container remove caddy request_id module by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/243
  • Remove deprecated code in preparation for v1.0 release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/244
  • make php-fpm listen on all interfaces by default. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/246
  • Updated container build process to be more standardized. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/247
  • Fixed #249 by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/250
  • implemented server side webhook request side debugging. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/252
  • Added new command to discover plex servers via token. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/255
  • Added early warning for failed server connection on config:add/edit by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/256
  • Updated FAQ.md and added clear warning when there permission issues by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/257
  • Send date played to Jellyfin & Emby when marking items as played. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/259
  • Added FAQ about not imported items. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/260
  • Partial support for jellyfin & emby mutli-episode one-file api by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/262
  • Added support for new Emby webhook events. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/263
  • Reverted support for Emby (library.new) webhook event. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/264
  • Fixes #265 and re-enable emby library.new webhook event. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/266
